member.name: T:MovieNews.Data.Movie
member.summary: Combines all available information about a movie

member.name: M:MovieNews.Data.Netflix.parseTop100(System.String)
member.summary: The function takes a response from Netflix and returns the parsed data as a sequence (IEnuemerable). This makes it easy to test from C# unit test project.

member.name: M:MovieNews.Data.NYTReview.tryPickReviewByName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: As in 'Netflix.fs', the following function takes the response as input and so it can be easily tested.
